segments.text: This whole scene is a study in contrasts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window looks so peaceful and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so oblivious to their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing over the sink, making an awful mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's probably ruining the cabinets and the floor already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there are the children, plotting their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically defying gravity on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a lack of awareness from the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It just feels so messy and wrong on so many levels.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before things get truly out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a perfect storm of impending accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
